addition[source]

addition(a:int, b:(<class 'float'>, <class 'int'>))

Adds two numbers together

Parameters:

  • a : <class 'int'>

    The first number to add

  • b : (<class 'float'>, <class 'int'>)

    The second number to add

Returns:

  • (<class 'float'>, <class 'int'>)

    The sum of a and b
